title_en: UN Member States’ level of support for treaty
description_en: UN Member States’ level of support for treaty

title_en: Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through reduction and elimination of the production of problematic plastics
description_en: Measures to minimise total pollution through reduction and elimination of the production of problematic plastics, limiting their inflow into the economy

title_en: Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through increased and non-toxic circulation of plastic products
description_en: Measures to minimise total pollution through increased and non-toxic circulation of remaining plastic products

title_en: Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through improved waste management, remediation activities, and other measures
description_en: Measures to minimise total pollution through improved waste management, remediation activities, and other measures to prevent, reduce and control plastic pollution

title_en: Support for treaty’s mechanisms to provide necessary support to countries for the implementation of the treaty’s obligations
description_en: Mechanisms to provide necessary support to countries for the implementation of the treaty’s obligations
